dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ian Kelley [mailto:ian@designbyian.com] 
Sent: Sunday, September 26, 2004 5:58 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

Hello,

The following site, hosted on a ThePlanet server, is running pirated
scripts.
searchsilver.com

The site is on the following server:
67.19.14.190

To help verify the copyright, you will find my email address
(ian@designbyian.com) in the source code of the copied scripts (if it
has not been removed by the time you read this). Please do not share
this information with searchsilver.com as it would facilitate future
piracy.

The scripts will probably be located in the cgi-bin directory but could
also be located in root public_html or a sub directory of cgi-bin. The
first script to look for would be sf.cgi. Some of the pirated scripts
will also probably be located in an additional sub directory called
/include.

Here are the names of the additional copied scripts you might find:
sf.cgi, clickstats.cgi, searchstats.cgi, proxyguard.cgi, earnings.cgi,
memclicks.cgi, cntryadmin.cgi, confirm.cgi, countrystats.cgi,
xmltweak.cgi, pglive.cgi, inactive.cgi, backup.cgi, feedme.cgi,
menume.cgi, miscme.cgi.

It is also likely that the base search engine scripts powering this site
is an illegal copy of scripts owned by SmarterScripts.com. These scripts
will contain code modifications copyrighted by me. This is in addition
to the complete scripts mentioned above. Base scripts that probably
contain pirated code modifications:
smartsearch.cgi, include.cgi, accounts.cgi, crawl.cgi, admin_misc.cgi,
functions.cgi, search.cgi and a variety of others.

I affirm that I am the sole owner of the copyrighted material in
question and that all information contained herein is true and correct.
I have attached a digital scan of my signature.

I am requesting immediate removal.

Thank you,

Ian Kelley

______________________________________________________________________
Ian Kelley - Web Design and Programming
Ending world hunger through clever UI implementation.

Ten years experience with HTML, web graphics, SEO and user interface
(UI) design. Five years experience with PHP, Databases, DHTML, Flash,
Javascript, CSS, and CGI (perl). Additional experience with XML, Apache
and Unix/Linux.

Website: http://www.designbyian.com/
Email: ian@designbyian.com
